page.title: 03HARDLEY SCHOOL
page.content:
Hardley School has a new science block, it cost half a million pounds to build. It has two biological gardens, two physics, two biology and two chemistry laboratories. Week days consist of 45x35 minute units. Three of these units are used for tutor work and assemblies and the remaining 42 are lessons. The subjects studied are as follows. 2nd Year 3rd Year
